title: Acting Chairman Senate urges students to focus on research and innovation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 08 (APP):Acting Chairman Senate, Syedaal Khan, on Saturday urged students to embrace modern research, scientific advancements, and innovative thinking to ensure the sustainable and efficient utilization of resources.
Addressing the convocation at Alhamd Islamic University, he congratulated the graduating students and encouraged them to move forward with confidence, humility, and a positive mindset.
He advised them to use their intelligence, energy, and vision to bring positive change to the world.
Praising their hard work and dedication, Syedaal Khan described the day as a moment of joy and celebration, marking the beginning of a new journey.
He commended Alhamd Islamic University as a beacon of knowledge and enlightenment, recognizing its role in promoting education and moral values.
He said that the university prioritizes academic excellence and ethical integrity, fostering an environment that encourages innovation, intellectual growth, and the pursuit of truth.
He also lauded the faculty and administration for maintaining high educational standards.
Addressing the graduates, Syedaal Khan said, “This is not just a degree; it is the key to your future. You are now prepared to face challenges, solve problems, and lead with courage and integrity.”
He stressed that success is not merely reaching a destination but is reflected in the values and impact one leaves on the world. He expressed gratitude to teachers, parents, and mentors for their role in shaping the students’ futures.
He reminded graduates to never underestimate the power of their education and values, stating that true success lies not only in personal achievements but in the difference, one makes in others’ lives.
Highlighting the natural resources and strategic significance of Balochistan, Syedaal Khan described it as a region rich in mineral wealth and the backbone of Pakistan’s economy.
He particularly emphasized Gwadar Port, noting its potential to drive economic growth not only for Pakistan but for the entire region.
